properties.description: intf.description or 'facing %s' % (peer_system.hostname or peer_system.label or peer_system.role)
properties.graph_query: match(node('interface', name='mlag_intf', mlag_id=not_none()).out('composed_of').node('interface').out('composed_of').node('interface', name='intf').in_('hosted_interfaces').node('system', name='system', system_id=not_none(), deploy_mode='deploy'),node('redundancy_group', name='rg').out('hosted_interfaces').node(name='mlag_intf'),node(name='intf').out('link').node('link', name='link', speed='10G').in_('link').node('interface', name='peer_intf').in_('hosted_interfaces').node('system', name='peer_system').ensure_different('intf', 'peer_intf'),optional(  node(name='mlag_intf').out('link').  node('link').in_('link').  node('interface', name='peer_of_mlag_intf').in_('hosted_interfaces')  .node(name='peer_node').ensure_different('mlag_intf', 'peer_of_mlag_intf')))

processors.name: Anomaly history MLAG imbalance between 10G members
